评论概述: Worth the extra cost!  Great quality!
评论详情: We started with a similar but brighter red coat from Amazon.  When it arrived, despite having a 4.2 rating, it was poorly constructed, low quality material and looked like it would probably rip apart.  We returned it and bit the bullet for this, more expensive coat.  TOTALLY worth it!!!This coat is MUCH nicer than the similar one that costs $15 less.  The zipper works well, the sewing is much better.  The decoration on the front is completely sewn around and looks sturdy.  The material doesnt look cheap.  This is a coat that will last multiple halloweens.  It runs a bit small in the chest and plenty long in the arms.  My daughter who normally wears a S/M got a large and it fits perfect (I wish it were a bit more loose for layers).  Very happy with our purchase.
Very nice jacket, better then anything from spirit halloween. Feel comfy and fits nice 🙂

评论概述: Low quality but cute for one time use
评论详情: The lace up holes on the back are barely attached. My daughter tried it on when she got it and 3 of them ripped with just a normal pull - definitely not tightly pulled like a corset. It's a low quality velvet type material. We ordered a size up - the arms were too long and the rest was a little loose but I wouldn't want to stress the fabric.
The jacket is a good value, sleeves are a little long for me but I will make it work!
This is a very nice, velvet jacket. I am 5’9” 190 lbs and normally wear a size 12 or XL. I needed an XXL because it was tight through the bust but you can cinch the jacket in the back for a nice fit.
This is exactly what I wanted and it fits perfect.  Huge thumbs up!

I got this for my daughter who wanted to wear to a renaissance fair. She loved it and it fit well and the material was really nice. For the price it was really worth buying it and live that we can cinch it up in the back with the laces. Looks great, feels great and all around is a great tail coat for the price.
A little better than expected. Seems sturdy. The back winches up for a better fit.

Unfortunately it's on the small size. Even though I went up a size it's still too small. Other than that I can wear it open which defeats the purpose I got it for. Everything else is good as far as the material and style. So go up a couple size if you're in the 40 + bust range.
